items.title: VI Live: Summerville slaat weer toe, Slot krijgt flinke domper te verwerken
items.summary: Zaterdagmiddag staan er niet alleen vijf wedstrijden in de Eredivisie op het programma, maar ook in het buitenland staan ons veel mooie potjes te wachten. Te beginnen met de Manchester Derby, gevolgd door onder meer Real Madrid, Liverpool, Arsenal, Bayern M√ºnchen en Internazionale. Volg het (inter)nationale voetbal in deze VI Live.

items.title: 'Chelsea trekt portemonnee voor Frans talent, Juve vindt spits bij Palace'
items.summary: De tijd van winterse versterkingen is aangebroken, in dit blog volgen we alle transferactiviteit in het buitenland. Bekijk hier ons blog voor de transferperikelen in Nederland.

items.title: Carrick challenges Utd after derby: Let's keep it up
items.summary: Michael Carrick has challenged his Manchester United players to keep it up after stunning Manchester City in his first game in charge.

items.title: Silva: Dalot deserved red, City lose 50-50 calls
items.summary: Manchester City's Bernardo Silva said his side's rivals win 50-50 refereeing decisions after their derby defeat to Man United.

items.title: Mbapp√© scores, Madrid win despite hostile crowd
items.summary: Kylian Mbapp√© scored a second-half penalty as crisis-hit Real Madrid saw off Levante with a 2-0 LaLiga victory inside a furious Bernabeu.

items.title: VI Live: Ajax werkt aan eerherstel tegen Go Ahead
items.summary: Ajax neemt het zaterdagmiddag om 16.30 uur op tegen Go Ahead Eagles. De Amsterdammers hebben wat goed te maken na de enorme bekerblamage tegen AZ van woensdag. Je volgt de wedstrijd in deze VI Live. In de VI Live behandelen we alleen de hoogtepunten. Voor alle wedstrijddetails kun je terecht in ons matchcenter .

items.title: Spaanse pers genadeloos voor uitgefloten Real-spelers
items.summary: Bernab√©u was zaterdagmiddag een giftige plek om te zijn, voornamelijk voor de spelers van thuisclub Real Madrid. De supporters maakten hun ongenoegen over de gang van zaken bij hun club pijnlijk duidelijk. Een overwinning op Levante bluste de brand ietsjes, maar ook de Spaanse pers geeft Real nog eens de volle laag.

items.title: Man Utd heeft Carrick positief verrast: 'Was bang dat de drang zou doorslaan'
items.summary: Michael Carrick heeft zich kostelijk vermaakt tijdens de start van zijn tweede termijn als interim-manager van Manchester United. De 44-jarige Engelsman maakte zich op voorhand een klein beetje zorgen over de enorme prestatiedrang van zijn ploeg. Die had Man Utd ook kunnen tegenwerken, stelde Carrick die het tegendeel werd bewezen tijdens de Manchester Derby.

items.title: European football: Mbapp√© spot on to deliver first Real Madrid win for Arbeloa
items.summary: Ra√∫l Asencio also on target in 2-0 win over Levante Marcus Rashford faces uncertain Barcelona future Real Madrid ended a turbulent week with a much-needed 2-0 win against relegation-threatened Levante, courtesy of second-half goals from Kylian Mbapp√© and Ra√∫l Asencio, after being met with boos from a restless Bernab√©u crowd before the breakthrough arrived. The win snapped Real‚Äôs two-match losing run and offered brief respite after a bruising week. They looked flat in the first half, still carrying the scars of Sunday‚Äôs 3-2 defeat by Barcelona in the final of the Supercopa de Espa√±a, followed by the departure of Xabi Alonso as manager the next day and a shock 3-2 Copa del Rey exit to second-division Albacete on Wednesday. This story will be updated Continue reading...

items.title: Man Utd players 'really care' - Carrick on derby heroics
items.summary: Manchester United boss Michael Carrick praises the attitude his players have shown since taking over, following his side's 2-0 derby victory against Manchester City in the Premier League.

items.title: Twelve-year ban for 'misogynistic' women's coach
items.summary: A former women's football coach is banned from the sport for 12 years after bombarding players and a member of staff with explicit images and suggesting they have sex.

items.title: 'The better team won' - Guardiola on derby defeat
items.summary: Manchester City head coach Pep Guardiola says "the better team won" after his side lost 2-0 to Manchester United in an exciting derby at Old Trafford to give Michael Carrick a win on his return as caretaker boss.

items.title: Senegal 'concerns' over treatment before Afcon final
items.summary: The Senegalese Football Federation (FSF) says a "lack of adequate security" left players and staff "at risk" on their arrival in Rabat for Sunday's final against hosts Morocco.

items.title: Carrick has dream start as Mbeumo and Dorgu give Manchester United derby delight
items.summary: On 64 minutes Michael Carrick‚Äôs second tenure went electric as Manchester United scored a classic breakaway goal by Bryan Mbeumo that sent the interim head coach berserk in the technical area. After a clearing Harry Maguire header, the ball evaded Rayan Cherki and Bruno Fernandes galloped forward. He had Amad Diallo to the right and Patrick Dorgu and Mbeumo on the left; United‚Äôs streetwise captain delayed the pass, then found the Cameroonian, whose finish beat Gianluigi Donnarumma. Continue reading...

items.title: London City Lionesses avoid FA Cup shock as Sangar√© header sinks Sunderland
items.summary: The fabled magic of the cup is yet to truly cast its spell on the women‚Äôs game and London City Lionesses avoided a shock exit with a professional display to win at Sunderland. Since the WSL kicked off in 2011, no side in the third tier or below has knocked out a top-tier club, and even second-tier clubs doing so has been a rarity. Continue reading...

items.title: McIlroy stays in contention as Lowry leads charge into Dubai Invitational final round
items.summary: Rory McIlroy gave himself an outside chance of winning the Dubai Invitational following a three-under-par 68 on Saturday.
